conbody.p: Dialog Nibelung provides you with the tools to assign, monitor and manage student activities in the classroom.
conbody.note: Please note that activities can be assigned only to groups of students.
conbody.p: An activity control tab ( ) will appear upon selecting an item from the Activities menu and the selected item will get a check mark.
Select None from the Activities to cancel all assigned activities.
All activity control tabs (except for Self access) also contain an elapsed time clock which starts upon activating the activity by pressing the Start button.
You can cancel an activity assignment by selecting a checked item from the Activities menu. Corresponding activity control tab will disappear.
conbody.note: Dialog Nibelung allows you to assign several activities to each group simultaneously.
conbody.p: A soon as the teacher assigns an activity (by pressing Start button in the activity control tab) the activity icon in the group or class tab becomes colored and is underlined in green.
conbody.note: Icon for the selected activity will be displayed in the group tab.
